key.name: enable-keybindings
key.description: When disabled, the shortcut to open the clipboard popup is not registered.

key.name: shortcut
key.summary: Keybinding to toggle the clipboard popup
key.description: Keybinding to open and close the clipboard history popup (Win+V style). Default is Super+V. If this conflicts with another shortcut, try <Super><Shift>v.

key.name: max-items
key.description: Maximum number of clipboard entries to keep in history.

key.name: persist-history
key.description: Save clipboard history to disk so it survives restarts.

key.name: ignore-password-like
key.description: When enabled, skip capturing text that looks like a password (e.g. long strings without spaces). Conservative heuristic to reduce accidental storage of secrets. Can be disabled if you get false positives.

key.name: clear-history-trigger
key.description: Increment this value to request clearing history (used by preferences).
